query:
SELECT
                t.id as toolkit_id,
                t.title,
                t.description,
                CAST(COUNT(tool.id) AS INTEGER) as "tools_count!: i64"
            FROM server_toolkits st
            JOIN toolkits t ON st.toolkit_id = t.id
            LEFT JOIN tools tool ON t.id = tool.toolkit_id
            WHERE st.server_id = ?
            GROUP BY t.id
            ORDER BY t.title
